00020 #include <boost/archive/xml_oarchive.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/archive/detail/polymorphic_oarchive_route.hpp>
00022 
00023 namespace boost { 
00024 namespace archive {
00025 
00026 typedef detail::polymorphic_oarchive_route<
00027     xml_oarchive_impl<naked_xml_oarchive> 
00028 > polymorphic_xml_oarchive;
00029 
00030 } // namespace archive
